channel.title: If u cant spawn items above 1000 do this!
channel.description:
if you can't spawn it make a command for it or try osmething like this Code: int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));that is a code in the pickup command try this instead Code: int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));works for me
IT WORKS! TRUST ME! BUT DONT LOOK WEIRD WHEN U DO LIKE ::PICKUP 10723 1 (IT HAS TO BE A RUNECRAFT (T) SKILLCAPE! BUT ITS A GOLDEN BOWL! SO THATS THE ONLY PROBLEM ATM! 100% CREDS TO krisdude !

item.title: If u cant spawn items above 1000 do this!
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

if you can't spawn it make a command for it or try osmething like this Code: int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));that is a code in the pickup command

try this instead
Code:
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));works for me

IT WORKS! TRUST ME! BUT DONT LOOK WEIRD WHEN U DO LIKE ::PICKUP 10723 1 (IT HAS TO BE A RUNECRAFT (T) SKILLCAPE! BUT ITS A GOLDEN BOWL! SO THATS THE ONLY PROBLEM ATM!

100% CREDS TO krisdude !
